TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManipulationPivot extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定如何使用一个用户输入点发生旋转。

span.span: Specifies how a rotation occurs with one point of user input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为 。The property is a . 在事件的 事件处理程序中设置时 ，如果用户在操作过程中使用一根手指，则操作将包含旋转数据。When you set in an event handler for the event, the manipulation will contain rotation data when the user uses one finger during a manipulation. 这是为了模拟真实世界的情况，在这种情况下，可以使用一根手指来旋转对象，例如表中的一张纸。This is to simulate real-world situations where you can use one finger to rotate an object, such as a piece of paper on a table. 如果 为 `null` ，则用户必须使用两根手指来产生旋转。If the is `null`, the user must use two fingers to cause rotation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序 并设置 属性。The following example shows an event handler for the event and sets the property. 若要测试此示例，请按照 [演练：创建您的第一个 Touch 应用程序](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application) 中的步骤操作，并将步骤4中的代码替换为此代码。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application) and replace the code in step 4 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#manipulationpivot)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#manipulationpivot)]

param.span: 数据附近的区域，用于确定单一触点启动操作时所发生的旋转量和转换量。

span.span: The area around the pivot that is used to determine how much rotation and translation occurs when a single point of contact initiates the manipulation.
